step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-ring in the bore of the range cylinder housing ( Figure 328).

figure.caption: Figure 327. Install O-Ring in Bore of Range Cylinder Housing

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the housing mounting surface and install the cylinder housing in the rear bore of the auxiliary housing, air fitting to the upper left ( Figure 329). Apply Loctite 242 and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm) to secure the cylinder housing to the auxiliary housing.

figure.caption: Figure 328. Install Cylinder Housing in Rear Bore of Auxiliary Housing

step1.para: Place the range yoke into position with the sliding clutch of the synchronizer assembly, long hub of yoke to the rear ( Figure 330). Insert threaded end of yoke bar through the yoke and into the bore of the range cylinder housing, aligning the notches in the bar with yoke lockscrew holes.

figure.caption: Figure 329. Place Range Yoke into Position

step1.para: Install the two yoke lockscrews, tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm) and lockwire securely ( Figure 331).
If previously removed, install the O-rings in the I.D. and O.D. of the range piston ( Figure 332).

figure.caption: Figure 331. Install O-Rings in I.D. and O.D. of Range Piston

step1.para: Install the range piston in the cylinder bore and onto the yoke bar, flat side to the rear ( Figure 333). Tighten the nut to 70 to 85 ft-lbs. (95 to 115 Nm) (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 332. Install Range Piston in Cylinder Bore

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the cover mounting surface and install the range cylinder cover on the housing, open port to the upper left ( Figure 334). Apply Loctite 242 and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 333. Install Range Cylinder Cover on Housing
